DataElement.preferredDefinition: is an organ, the organ parts of which primarily consist of dentine and dental enamel; together with other teeth it constitutes a subdivision of the facial skeleton. Example(s): incisor, molar. The act of pulling out, including the process of obtaining something from a mixture or compound by chemical or physical or mechanical means. Recommendation; advice telling someone what the best thing to do is. The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: is an organ, the organ parts of which primarily consist of dentine and dental enamel; together with other teeth it constitutes a subdivision of the facial skeleton. Example(s): incisor, molar.

Concepts.definition: The hard bonelike structures in the jaws of vertebrates; primarily used for eating.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.
